data.title: XERO to Super-Hero – Full day – Local
data.meta_description: Beautiful accounting software made even more beautiful with this one day program where you’ll learn how to competently manage your finances using cloud…
data.text:
Beautiful accounting software made even more beautiful with this one day program where you’ll learn how to competently manage your finances using cloud accounting. We’ll show you the time-saving tools you need save 20 hours downtime every month managing your bookkeeping tasks.

​Get ready to learn about automating your workflows, streamlining your daily processes and get your financial records sorted.

We’ll walk you through the everyday tasks and give you the tips and tricks to ease your bookkeeping and administration burden and the associated stresses. And set up automation to get the mundane tasks done so you can focus on what really matters – growing a successful business, up-skilling and achieving lifestyle balance.

Whether you are self-taught and want to fill in the gaps for greater efficiency and productivity, or whether you have never used XERO before, this one-day course will set you up with a solid foundation to do Beautiful Online Accounting.
